wikitext.*:
Below is a list of '''Tolkien Societies'''.

==Active as of 2023==
*''North America''
** [[Inland Northwest Tolkien Society|Inland Northwest Tolkien Society (a.k.a. Spokane Tolkien Society / Inland Empire Tolkien Society]] (active)
** [[Mythopoeic Society]] (active)
** [[American Mensa Tolkien Special Interest Group|Tolkien Special Interest Group of Mensa]] (active)
** [[University of Wisconsin Tolkien and Fantasy Society]] (active)
** Mexico: [[Mexican Tolkien Society]] (active)
** NYC Area Friends of JRR Tolkien (active)<ref>https://www.meetup.com/nyc-area-friends-of-tolkien-fantasy/</ref>

*''South America''
** Argentina: [[Argentine Tolkien Association]] (active)
** Brazil: 
*** [[Conselho Branco, Sociedade Tolkien]] (active)
*** [[The Brazilian Tolkien Society]] (active)
** Chile: [[Sociedad Tolkien Chilena]] (semi dormant: last activity from 2020)
** Colombia: [[Sociedad Tolkien Colombia Orodruin]] (active)
** Peru: [[Sociedad Tolkien Peruana]] (active)
** Uruguay: [[Sociedad Tolkien Uruguaya]] (active)

*''Europe''
** Austria: [[Austrian Tolkien Society]] (active)
** Czech Republic: [[Czech Tolkien Society]] (active)
**Denmark: 
***[[Bri, Tolkienselskabet i København]] (active)
***[[Imladris, Danmarks Tolkienforening]] (semi dormant)
** Finland: [[Suomen Tolkien-seura Kontu ry.]] (active)
** France: [[Tolkiendil (Tolkien society)|Tolkiendil]] (active)
** Belgium: [[Elanor (Tolkien Society)|Flemish Tolkien & Fantasy Society Elanor]] (active)
** Germany: [[Deutsche Tolkien Gesellschaft e.V.]] (active)
** Greece:  [[Ellinikós Sýllogos Philon Tólkin]] (active)
** Hungary: [[Hungarian Tolkien Society]] (active)
** Italy: 
***[[Società Tolkieniana Italiana|Italian Tolkien Association]] (active)
***[[Associazione italiana studi Tolkieniani|Italian Association of Tolkien Studies]] (active)
** Lithuania: [[Tolkien Lietuva]] (active)
** Netherlands: 
*** [[Unquendor|Tolkien Society Unquendor]] (active)
*** [[Ennorandirrim]] (active)
** Norway: [[Arthedain (Tolkien Society)|Norges Tolkien Forening Arthedain]] (active)
** Poland: [[Sekcja Tolkienowska ŚKF|Parmadili'', Sekcja Tolkienowska Śląskiego Klubu Fantastyki]] (active)
** Russia: [[St Petersburg Tolkien Society]] (active)
** Slovenia: [[Gil-Galad (Tolkien Society)|Gil-galad]] (active)
**Spain: [[Spanish Tolkien Society]] (active)
** Sweden:
***[[Angmar, Malmö Tolkiensällskap]] (active)
***[[Forodrim|Forodrim, Stockholms Tolkiensällskap]] (active)
***[[Mithlond, Göteborgs Tolkiensällskap]] (active)
***[[Uppsala Tolkiensällskap]] (active)
**United Kingdom:
***[[Cambridge Tolkien Society]] (active)
***[[Taruithorn (Tolkien Society)|Taruithorn - The Oxford Tolkien Society]] (active)
***'''[[The Tolkien Society]]''' (active)

*''Asia Pacific''
** Japan: [[Shiro no Norite]] (unclear)
** Israel: [[Israeli Tolkien Society]] (active)
** Australia: [[Hern Ennorath]] (active)

==Defunct as of 2023==

*''North America''
** [[Idaho and Montana Tolkien Society]]
** [[American Tolkien Society]]
** [[New England Tolkien Society]]
** [[North East Tolkien Society]]
** [[The National Tolkien League]]
** [[Tolkien Society of America]] (merged with [[Mythopoeic Society]])

*Latin America
**Brazil: [[Heren Hyarmen]]
*''Europe''
** Belgium: [[Belegaer (Tolkien Society)|Belegaer - Cercle d'etudes de Tolkien en Belgique]]
** Denmark: 
***[[Dansk Tolkien Selskab]] (merged to become Imladris)
***[[Tolkiens Følge]] (merged to become Imladris)
** Estonia: [[Estonian Tolkien Society]]
** France:  
*** [[French Tolkien Association|Tolkien & Co]]
*** [[L'association La Faculté des études elfiques|FEE]]
*** [[L'association La Compagnie de la Comté]]
** Netherlands: [[The Fellowship]]
** Poland: 
*** Loza Tolkienowska Krakow
*** [[Sekcja Tolkienowska ŚKF]]
** Sweden: 
*** [[Arda (annual)|Arda-sällskapet]] (defunct: last activity: 2021)
*** [[Caradhras, Södra latins Tolkiensällskap]] (defunct: last activity: 2017)
*** [[The Tolkien Society of Sweden]]
*** [[Osgiliath, Västerås Tolkiensällskap]]
*** [[Galadhon, Lunds Tolkiensällskap]]
** Switzerland: 
*** [[Eredain|Swiss Tolkien Society]]
*** Switzerland: [[Society Tolkieniana Switzerland Smial of the Ticino]]

*''Asia Pacific''
** Australia: [[Mythopoeic Literature Society]]
** Malaysia: [[North Borneo Frodo Society]]
** Philippines: [[Philippine Tolkien Society]]

*''Africa''
** South Africa: [[Haradrim (Tolkien Society)|Haradrim]]
